TEXT: The applicant , who was born in DATE , is a NORP citizen , resident in PERSON . He is currently detained at FAC . Before the ORG , he is represented by his brother , PERSON .

On DATE four persons from the same family , PERSON , GPE , PERSON and PERSON were found dead near their house in PERSON . The ensuing police investigation led to the arrest of ORG ( GPE ) on DATE . Whilst he was in police detention GPE confessed that he had killed PERSON , GPE , PERSON and GPE .. He stated that CARDINAL other persons , including the applicant , had also been involved in the killing . On DATE the applicant was detained on the ground of these allegations . In his statement , allegedly taken under duress in the police station , the applicant confessed that he had been involved in the murders .

On DATE the applicant was brought before the public prosecutor and the ORG in Criminal Matters . In his defence submissions he retracted from his statement taken in the police station and denied all the charges against him . On DATE he was placed in detention on remand together with the other CARDINAL co - accused .
On DATE ORG instituted criminal proceedings in ORG against the applicant and the other CARDINAL co - accused , GPE , ORG . B.

ORG heard oral evidence from the witnesses called both by the prosecution and defence , examined the autopsy reports and conducted a survey of the scene of the crime . The ORG court further carried out an investigation into the applicant ’s allegations of ill - treatment in police detention . It examined the medical reports and heard oral evidence from the police officers , who were allegedly responsible .

On DATE ORG convicted the applicant of homicide and sentenced him to lifetime imprisonment . It held that the CARDINAL co - accused had acted with premeditation in order to steal PERSON ’s jewellery and killed PERSON , GPE , PERSON and PERSON to destroy the evidence and the traces . The court also found that GPE had killed GPE , GPE had killed ORG . B. had killed ORG and the applicant had killed PERSON

The applicant appealed and on DATE ORG quashed the judgment of DATE without examining the merits of the case for violation of procedural rules . It stated that the record of the trial , dated DATE , was signed by a recording clerk of the court other than the one mentioned in the record .
ORG , to which the case was referred , re - examined the case and on DATE convicted the applicant of homicide and sentenced him to lifetime imprisonment .
The applicant appealed against this judgment . On DATE ORG , upholding the cogency of ORG assessment of evidence and reasoning dismissed the appeal by CARDINAL votes against CARDINAL .
On DATE ORG attached to ORG challenged the decision of DATE on the ground that there was not enough evidence to convict the applicant of homicide .

On DATE ORG of ORG , upholding the cogency of ORG assessment of evidence and its reasoning in rejecting the applicant ’s defence , dismissed ORG request to acquit the applicant by CARDINAL votes against CARDINAL . In the dissenting opinions it was stated that the applicant was probably involved in the killing , but that there was not the decisive element of proof which would definitively establish the liability of the applicant and that it could not be entirely excluded that GPE ’s account of facts was true .
